welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rucphen, Netherlands! This charming city is known for its beautiful natural landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rucphen has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport is used for handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and small aircraft operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
